data.title: IronCurtain/ChronoShift code cleanup
data.body: Reading through it investigating https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/4893. Found nothing, but did some maintenance: coding style and trait documentation also un-hardcoded a sound file.

data.title: Removed flickering order lines when selecting idle actors
data.body: as described in #5039 which also annoyed me.

data.title: Fixed sandbags connecting to concrete walls
data.body: as described in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/5232. Turns out this was already configurable, just forgotten.

data.title: Added a description for the Pillbox
data.body: Fixes #5050

data.title: Fixes two causes of transport related crashes
data.body: Fixes #4790 and also fixes #5270

data.title: Stop repair wrench animation if player has no money
data.body: Repair icon shouldn't pulsate if it's not actually repairing.

data.title: Moving all files to the the Common namespace/project
data.body:
and only having RA specific files in the RA namespace

Note: Will be rebasing these as changes to bleed come until this is merged

data.title: Funpark Mission 1
data.body:
So this is about 95% complete, i want to get some opinions on how it plays etc.

Some things to note about this mission:
- Is a near 1:1 of the original from cnc95
- You will hear a reinforcements have arrived before the fmv plays (if this doesn't happen you fail the mission)
- It uses the old lua
- The dinosaurs are a bit strange at times

My plans for finishing up this mission:
- Give the dinosaurs there own team flag and make their colour more of an orange
- Make the T-Rex aggreesive to all the buildings in the civilian town

Also just noticed i have a mouse cursor in my preview png :\

data.title: Addet Clock-Icon
data.body: related to #5245

data.title: Added UncloakOnAttack variable to Cloak
data.body: This allows us to tell the cloak trait if it should decloak on attacking, default is true so shouldnt break any existing units.

data.title: Build-in screenshot capturing
data.body:
Add a shortcut key to take screenshots (Print screen?).

The screenshot file names could be similar replay filenames (date/time) and could be stored in a directory structure similar to replays (`Replays/<modname>/<version>/*`).

data.title: Add ore mine graphics to interior tileset
data.body:
Closes #4500.

Tested on Room Convergence, works.

data.title: Make Reset button font bold in RA Settings menu
data.body: Fixes #5314.

data.title: Reset button in the RA settings menu is not bold
Fixes #5059 force fire not working on pillboxes
Fixes #5049 Camo Pillbox not decloaking when attacking
Ship a new release
data.body:
Our current bleed has changed significantly since the December release, and even the April playtest.  We need to prioritize getting a new release out.

I propose:
- Declare a feature-freeze, and politely comment on any new non-release-blocker fixes that they will need to wait for the next release cycle.
- Work towards polishing and merging at least #5234, #5252, #5266, #5279, #5296, #5306, #5309, #5310 (which I consider critical), and as many of the other existing PRs that time permits.
- Release an "RC1" playtest ASAP after the issues I noted above are merged
- Work towards resolving the remaining release blockers, and do more RCs until we converge on a stable build.

data.title: Patched the console PR as requested by xanax`
data.body: The original was merged prematurely.

data.title: Fixes #5278: SAM site on the TD shellmap starts open
data.body:
I think I got this.

Previously, not only it was starting open on the shellmap, when you build one in-game it would be built open and then close immediately, without animation.

Now the it starts closed on the shellmap and stays open (for a while) when you build it in-game.

data.title: Bogus d2k english
data.body: https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/blob/bleed/mods/d2k/rules/atreides.yaml#L212

data.title: Fixes #3036
data.body:
Like #5149 (closed with #5191), it will not scroll to bottom if it's scrolled up.

The only difference is that it will explicitly scroll to bottom when the user types a message themselves.

data.title: Fix for harvester husk Z sorting on refinery
data.body:
...by lowering the refinery's ZOffset, but adding an idle top with higher ZOffset.

Fixes #5087.

I hope this is what @chrisforbes and @pchote had in mind when talking about splitting art in #5092.

data.title: Added resource splattering to destroyed harvesters
data.body: However, the mechanic introduced (weapons being able to create resource patches) is much more generic. https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/2346 This is just a default setup as suggested in #2074. You can now also create Tiberium missiles etc.

data.title: Added Music downloads
data.body:
This essentially removes a lot of copy and pasta code from the per mod CD rip algorithms. They were pretty much identical except for the hard-coded file names. I also ported the previously Tiberian Dawn exclusive music ripper function to all mods and enhanced it with an optional download option as wished in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/4759 now that we have a strong mirror network. This also makes it easier for modders to get their own Soundtrack download hooked up without writing new code.

Note: this depends on https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRAWeb/pull/111 which has been ignored for months so I hard-coded to the URL of my git branch there. It should be changed to http://open-ra.org/packages/ once deployed.

data.title: Fixes warning message when compiling under Windows (MSBuild/VS)
data.body: MSBuild gives a warning for every project that doesn't define a PlatformTarget, which is rather annoying.

data.title: Added pause and surrender console commands
data.body: Minor clean-up and two new commands wired up that don't require developer cheats.

data.title: SeedsResource trait messes with make anim
Crash on Startup Mac OS X 10.8.5
data.body:
Hi guys

Very cool project this!! Just trying to get it running on my Mac. When I launch OpenRA,
I get a black screen with the spinning beachball of death and this is how it stays. All my log files are blank.

I have:
- installed the latest version of Mono for Mac OS X.
- restarted machine
- re-installed OpenRA and Mono

No luck yet. Any help would be great thanks.
Ernus

data.title: More effects when infiltrating different buildings with a spy
data.body:
while im not sure anymore with #3273 , because it would be just really "devastating" (even with only 10-15 seconds complete blackout ) here is a different idea :
we could make the spy power-down a single specific defense structure for like 10-12 seconds , the enemy player not being able to regain energy for this particular structure as long as the effect lasts ... aka. the power button on top wont work on this building 
![spy1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1997864/2952894/0fd0b5e0-da47-11e3-900c-c59c61d62c6d.png)
would work with : Tesla , Gap Generator , SAM Site , AA Gun 

Next thing is , as allready discussed a while ago in IRC ... 
let him set back the launch-timer for Nuke , Crono , IC and GPS when entering the associated building 
im not sure about "how much time" exactly , but back to 00:00 sounds kinda hard , specially for Nukes and GPS 

and last one , ive noticed ... its not possible to target vehicles with the spy ... so he cant shoot vehicles ... this is kinda sad because it would allow some neat ideas ... 
specially in times where "these vehicles" get spammed ... over and over again :
![spy2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1997864/2952922/1f4f63e4-da48-11e3-939d-af908bc47bdd.png)

---

Here a couple various ideas from Sleipnir Stuff , not further discussed : 
- [x] Power Plants: Power outage for X seconds. https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/3273
- [ ] Any production facility: Auto-cancels and pauses all further construction progress for the type of unit the infiltrated facility makes for X seconds.
- [ ] Radar Dome: The owner of the Dome shares vision with you (one way) for X seconds and has his shroud/fog reset. Radar is disabled for the infiltrated player during this time.
- [ ] Missile Silo/Super Weapon: Nuke/Super Weapon progress reset and paused for X seconds.
- [ ] Defensive Structure (Turret, Tesla Cannon, Gap Generator, etc...): Infiltrated structure is hijacked, attacking or otherwise working against its owner and allies for a brief period of time. Units in a pillbox are assassinated.
- [ ] Tech Center: If infiltrating a Soviet tech center you can build the Iron Curtain. Otherwise you disable the enemy's GPS Satellite for X seconds or reset and pause its progress for X seconds if it hasn't yet launched. All units and structures with the Tech Center as a prerequisite are cancelled and can't be built for X seconds. 
- [ ] For infiltrating TC's, I really would mind going down the RA2 route (as much as I dislike so many aspects of the game) and allowing construction of special units from Barracks and War Factory. What units? Erm, new ones.
